title: (Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) Order 2024.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport media) order 2024

title: (Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) Order 2024.
heading: Juno McEnroe, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. 

Juno McEnroe, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media with effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 juno mcenroe particular whose address deposited office department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium appointed special adviser minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium effect 9 april 2024

title: (Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) Order 2024.
heading: 3. Meghan McSweeney, particulars of whose address have been deposited
text_raw:
3. Meghan McSweeney, particulars of whose address have been deposited 
at the offices of the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media with effect from 9 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 

7 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [212] 3
